issue.title: add hint text to Search field in Palette

content.raw: Ah, I see the issue. In this case, I think it's better to leave the focus in the search field and just not have the hint text unless the user deletes the search query and clicks out of the field. I suspect that users would prefer the faster interaction of clicking on the Search tab and immediately being able to type their query, without having to first click into the field.
